about_the_game:
POOOOL is a small, pool-inspired physics-based puzzler where you combine pool balls of matching size and color to create bigger ones! Combining balls increases your score, but if the table gets too full and you run out of room, it's game over. Use only your mouse to control the angle and power of every shot!



  • ⚪ Create combos and perform bank shots with satisfying physics interactions!
  • 🔴 Choose the power and angle of each fling! Click and drag anywhere on the screen!
  • 🟠 Control the entire game with ease and comfort using just your mouse.
  • 🟡 Charming and customizable backgrounds and faces.
  • 🟢 Compete against yourself to beat your hi-score!
  • 🔵 Share your scores with custom postcard snapshots. Share with friends!
  • 🟣 Every round is different — endlessly replayable!





  • ⚪ Click and hold where you want the ▼ ball to go, then drag your mouse to choose the angle and power!
  • 🔴 You can click anywhere on the screen! The further you drag, the more power you'll fling the ball with.
  • 🟠 After dragging, release to fling the ▼ ball!
  • 🟡 If two balls of the same color and size collide, they combine into a bigger one.
  • 🟢 Each match adds to your score. The bigger the ball, the higher the score!
  • 🔵 The meter shows how full the play area is. Once it reaches 75% full, it's game over!
